metadata.Title: CVE-2020-36732 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: The crypto-js package before 3.2.1 for Node.js generates random numbers by concatenating the string "0." with an integer, which makes the output more predictable than necessary.

notes.Note: sbeattie> introduced in the conversion to native crypto in crypto-js v3.2.0

criterions.comment: cryptojs: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
